name: dewy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with dew (= the drops of water that form on the ground and other surfaces outside during the night): a dewy morning Her dewy skin has the look of a woman 20 years younger. See
dew
More examplesFewer examplesthe cool, dewy freshness of morningFor a fresh, dewy complexion, apply the moisturizer daily.Rabbits ran across the dewy grass.
